config.description:
A template for rendering descendants of an entity on its main layout, e.g. a journal listing some recent issues or a series listing featured papers.
Contained within the `MAIN` layout.

prop.name: variant
prop.description: The variant rendering mode to use for this template. Affects presentation.

prop.name: background
prop.description: The background gradient to use for this template. Affects presentation.

prop.name: selection_source
prop.description:
When selecting entities based on `selectionMode`, this property determines which entity (relevant to the rendering entity) should be used for lookups.
By default, it is `self`, which means the rendering entity itself.
It can also support things like `ancestor.journal`, `ancestor.issue`, etc., in order to render a list of values in its parent.

prop.name: selection_source_mode
prop.description: An enum representing what mode `selectionSource` is in. Not directly set, it is used internally for lookups.

prop.name: selection_limit
prop.description: Regardless of `selectionMode`, this limit will be applied on whatever resulting list of entities are produced, so that only up to that amount of entities are rendered in the template proper.

prop.name: dynamic_ordering_definition
prop.description: When `selectionMode` is set to `DYNAMIC`, this uses the same basic structure as schemas to define a dynamic ordering that is resolved at runtime and based on the `selectionSource`.

prop.name: ordering_identifier
prop.description: When `selectionMode` is set to `NAMED`, this will look up the named ordering on the resolved `selectionSource` and render up to `selectionLimit` entities.

prop.name: manual_list_name
prop.description: When `selectionMode` is set to `MANUAL`, the purpose of this property is to specify a name under which all the manual selections (per entity) will be stored. This allows a layout to have multiple templates of the same type using different lists, that will persist across rearrangements of the layout _without_ losing connections between entities.

prop.name: selection_property_path
prop.description: When `selectionMode` is set to `PROPERTY`, this should be set to the full path for a given schema property on the associated `selectionSource`
